body: The target becomes flexible regardless of its actual size and mass. It can move through areas at least half its size with no penalty for squeezing. It can move through a space at least one-quarter its width using the penalties for squeezing through a space at least half its width.
description: The target becomes flexible regardless of its actual size and mass.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Vishkanyas/New Racial Rules/Vishkanya Spells/Squeeze
level_text: alchemist: 2; investigator: 2; sorcerer: 2; wizard: 2; arcanist: 2; witch: 2
name: Squeeze
